textPlain: This is pretty cool, I like to see this kind of project coming to Zig.  Zig's compile-time language features make DbC a natural fit.I am not yet proficient enough in Zig to be able to evaluate how well the syntax fits into idiomatic Zig.Good work.

Thanks.I'm new to Zig myself and created this library because I had trouble verifying the correctness of the code I wrote for a set of complex data structures in another larger Zig project (this one: https://github.com/habedi/ordered). I'm currently experimenting with how to use DbC in Zig, which led to the creation of this library.
